author: bago
msg: Altered parser to skip the T_PREAMBLE token when there is no preamble in the input message. Updated tests to avoid expecting T_PREAMBLE. Updated roundtrip tests expectation with the right results. (MIME4J-177)

msg: add a default value (false) for malformedHeaderStartsBody

msg: Improve toString debug for BufferedLineReaderInputStream in order to debug temporary buffer state.
